column4: I have intel motherboard D102GGC2 with inbuilt ATI radeon express 200, running Hardy. My compiz does not run. Says Xgl not available. Only default metacity runs. Help
install drivers, if that does not solve, right click desktop, click change desktop background, select visual effects, change selection to normal then re-log
what background do I choose? visual effects none only runs
Visual effects None only can be chosen
